chapter.title: Examples
chapter.para: There are several examples in the HDIV's distribution to show how to apply HDIV to different target technologies. These are the steps to follow (download, installation and configuration) for each sample application:

section.title: Spring MVC
section.para: hdiv-spring-mvc-showcase is the sample application that show the integration between Spring Mvc and Hdiv. Follow the steps below in order to test the application:
section.programlisting: git clone git://github.com/hdiv/hdiv-spring-mvc-showcase.git cd hdiv-spring-mvc-showcase mvn package mvn tomcat:run

section.title: Spring MVC and Thymeleaf
section.para: thymeleafexamples-petclinic is the sample application that show the integration between Spring Mvc, Thymeleaf and Hdiv. Follow the steps below in order to test the application:
section.programlisting: git clone git://github.com/hdiv/thymeleafexamples-petclinic.git cd thymeleafexamples-petclinic mvn package mvn tomcat7:run

section.title: Grails
section.para: hdiv-grails-showcase is the reference sample application that show the integration between Grails and Hdiv. Follow the steps below in order to test the application:
section.programlisting: git clone git://github.com/hdiv/hdiv-spring-mvc-showcase.git cd hdiv-spring-mvc-showcase mvn package mvn tomcat:run

section.title: Struts 1
section.para: hdiv-struts-example application it the reference application that show the integration between Struts 1.3.8 and HDIV.
section.programlisting: git clone git://github.com/hdiv/hdiv-struts-examples.git cd hdiv-struts-examples mvn package mvn tomcat:run

section.title: JSF
section.para: hdiv-jsf-example application for JSF is the reference example application for JSF. Follow the steps below in order to test the application:
section.programlisting: git clone git://github.com/hdiv/hdiv-jsf-example.git cd hdiv-jsf-example mvn package mvn tomcat:run

section.title: Struts 2
section.para: Struts 2 and HDIV integration reference application is included within HDIV 2.0.4 examples. To test the application follow the next steps:
section.programlisting: cd hdiv-struts2-example mvn package mvn tomcat:run

chapter.para:
Note that all the examples are also available within HDIV distributions at HDIV web site
and GitHub
